top_comments.comment: Love the bedding and wall hanging above, but wall decal seems lost? I personally don't like puddling of bedding look. Maybe bedskirt? But overall so cute! Hope Chico heals up well

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Lovely as always! I am so glad that You moved that thing with drawers.
The pillows that you did turned out beautiful but not so much those that you bought. :(
I, absolutely, love this look. It's different from all of your other ones.
That's super cute.  The lighting made such a huge difference; also love the color scheme of the design. =)
Get well soon Chico, love you James,Alexandra and team AG great job! 👍 Some really good ideas for renters.
I'm with you on changing the bedspread, it looks much better and the size was better. I love the color.
Not a drastic change? It’s a huge improvement! Great job, Alexandra.

Another excellent job. I didn’t know about Command hooks to use on the ceiling. That’s going to allow me to hang a plant in my bathroom without putting a hole in the ceiling. Thanks. I enjoy your videos a great deal.
Love the bedding and wall hanging above, but wall decal seems lost? I personally don't like puddling of bedding look. Maybe bedskirt? But overall so cute! Hope Chico heals up well
You do a great job on the makeovers, but I wish you would stop including all the giggling and outtakes. You can still be you, but rein it in a little please.

I love this bc it’s so realistic - I put stuff down and look at it and change my mind and move it like 800 times. 

Get well Xico!
Sponsored by Cricut?! Damn. Congrats!
Love this look 💗
Question: In decorating any room, do you really need a carpet? Can it all come together without it? Because carpets are an allergen and we all sneeze when I try to get rugs for the house.
Changing to that second option on the bedding made all the difference. And girl, you need to stop wasting all that Cricut material!

WOW. That looks FANTASTIC 🤩. All your tips are super helpful & creative. Love the plants as a divider, the art, lighting, & I totally do the king sized cover hack. You added so much coziness, depth & storage to the space. Do you use rug pads or tape to keep the rugs from slipping?
can we have james on the set more...we need more eye candy

James & Chico in one episode! Magic!  🪄 Get well, Chico! 
But excuse me ☝🏾…. You did the dang thing here! This space is soooo GOOD! 👌🏾 You understood the assignment!! ✅
My family loves Xico too. Hope he gets better soon because we miss him.❤❤
where's the kitchen?
Oh no! Bed skirt is a must. A tailored bed skirt to offset the boho. Tailored will help center the disparate colors.
